## common.createReducer() function

创建一个reducer函数

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function createReducer<State, Action extends {
    type: string;
}>(handlers: Record<string, (state: State, action: Action) => State>, initialState: State): (state: State | undefined, action: Action) => State;
```
